scripts.build:docs: npm run clean && npm run babel && npm run browserify:docs
scripts.build-debug:docs: npm run babel-debug && npm run browserify:docs-debug
scripts.watch:docs: npm run build:docs && chokidar './index.js' './docs/index.js' './es6/**/*.js' -c 'npm run build:docs'
scripts.watch-debug:docs: npm run build-debug:docs && chokidar './index.js' './docs/index.js' './es6/**/*.js' -c 'npm run build-debug:docs'
scripts.build:example: npm run clean && npm run babel && npm run browserify:example
scripts.build-debug:example: npm run babel-debug && npm run browserify:example-debug
scripts.watch:example: npm run build:example && chokidar './index.js' './example/index.js' './es6/**/*.js' -c 'npm run build:example'
scripts.watch-debug:example: npm run build-debug:example && chokidar './index.js' './example/index.js' './es6/**/*.js' -c 'npm run build-debug:example'
